title: (x) "Fame" movie and TV show logo - custom designed {Yves}
content:
I'm looking for the name and where to locate the font that was used for the TV show Fame

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fame.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/typophile.com/files/fame.jpg) | 18.18 KB |
author: rickeyroberts

comments.content: That's a custom design. I don't know if we can find similar stuff.

I very much doubt that this is a font; it's almost certainly hand-lettered. If you want an exact copy of it, you'll have to use Illustrator or FontLab to trace it, or create a high-res version in Photoshop. You might be able to find some script fonts that are reminiscent of it, though. Off the top of my head, [Whomp](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000173) from Sudtipos has a similar feel, although it's a bit quirkier than your logo.

I'm working on a bold copperplate script font that has a similar look to that. I don't know when I'll have it finished.

Jess Latham  
 [www.bvfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/www.bvfonts.com/ "www.bvfonts.com")

Similar:  
 [American Pop Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/american-pop/two/)  
 [Ballpark Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/ballparkscript.shtml)  
and our good friend [Fulton Sign Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130415164841/http:/typophile.com/node/30123).

- Lex

hand-lettered: don't waste time looking around.  
create it by yourself or give it to a pro...
